main_definition: To move or operate at a greater speed, to accomplish something more quickly than usual.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Comparing two things in terms of their speed.
meanings_and_examples.example: The new train is faster than the old one.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Improving efficiency or performance to be more quick or prompt.
meanings_and_examples.example: She learned to type faster over time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To increase speed in a particular context, like when cooking or driving.
meanings_and_examples.example: He decided to heat the water on the stove faster by using higher flame.

meanings_and_examples.definition: When referring to an improvement in skill level or ability.
meanings_and_examples.example: After taking dance lessons, he could execute moves much faster than before.
